statements: SELECT * FROM UserPermissions
SELECT user_id, access_level FROM UserPermissions WHERE access_level > 2
SELECT facial_data FROM UserPermissions WHERE user_id = 5
SELECT * FROM UserPermissions ORDER BY access_level DESC
SELECT user_id, facial_data FROM UserPermissions WHERE user_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT user_id, access_level, facial_data FROM UserPermissions WHERE access_level > 5 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT access_level, facial_data, user_id FROM UserPermissions WHERE user_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY access_level ASC, user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM UserPermissions WHERE facial_data IS NOT NULL ORDER BY access_level DESC, user_id ASC;
SELECT facial_data, access_level, user_id FROM UserPermissions WHERE access_level < 3 ORDER BY facial_data, user_id;
SELECT user_id, facial_data, access_level FROM UserPermissions WHERE user_id BETWEEN 2 AND 4 ORDER BY user_id ASC, access_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM UserPermissions;
SELECT user_id, permission_type FROM UserPermissions ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, permission_type FROM UserPermissions WHERE permission_type = 'admin';
SELECT facial_id, user_id, captured_at FROM FacialRecognitionData WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT user_id, permission_type, facial_data_access FROM UserPermissions WHERE facial_data_access = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, permission_type FROM UserPermissions WHERE facial_data_access = TRUE;
SELECT facial_id, user_id, captured_at FROM FacialRecognitionData ORDER BY captured_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, permission_type FROM UserPermissions ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, permission_type, facial_data_access FROM UserPermissions WHERE permission_type = 'admin' AND facial_data_access = FALSE;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM UserPermissions GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT id, username FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT permission_type, user_id FROM permissions ORDER BY permission_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM facial_recognition_data WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT id, image_path, user_id FROM facial_recognition_data WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, username FROM users;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT id, image_path FROM facial_recognition_data WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT permission_type, user_id FROM permissions JOIN users ON permissions.user_id = users.id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, username, password FROM users WHERE user_id = 'd230b3fa-8e02-4a84-903c-74aa11e810b1';
SELECT * FROM permissions ORDER BY permission_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, image_path, created_at FROM facial_recognition_data WHERE user_id = 'ce4509e0-877f-41b7-8e13-2467afb4c32e';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'JOHN%';
SELECT username, permission_name FROM users u JOIN user_permissions up ON u.user_id = up.user_id JOIN permissions p ON up.permission_id = p.permission_id WHERE u.role = 'user';
SELECT u.username, p.permission_name FROM users u LEFT JOIN user_permissions up ON u.user_id = up.user_id LEFT JOIN permissions p ON up.permission_id = p.permission_id WHERE u.username = 'alice';
SELECT u.username, count(up.permission_id) as permissions_count FROM users u LEFT JOIN user_permissions up ON u.user_id = up.user_id GROUP BY u.username HAVING permissions_count > 1;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT role_name, description FROM roles WHERE role_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT permission_name, description FROM permissions WHERE permission_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE username = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, username, role_id FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id;
SELECT role_name, description FROM roles WHERE role_name LIKE 'Admin%';
SELECT permission_name, description FROM permissions WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
